verses.text: \w As|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w drew|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*,

“\w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth. \w So|strong="H1980"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* prove yourself \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* decrees, \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w prosper|strong="H7919"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w wherever|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w turn|strong="H6437"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w fulfill|strong="H6965"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w promise|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*: ‘\w If|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H8104"\w* \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* faithfully \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w fail|strong="H3772"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.’

\w Moreover|strong="H1571"\w*, \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*—\w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Abner \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jether|strong="H3500"\w*,\f + \fr 2:5 \ft Jether is a variant of Ithra; also in verse 32; see 2 Samuel 17:25.\f* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w armies|strong="H6635"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* peacetime \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w avenge|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*. \w He|strong="H6213"\w* stained \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w belt|strong="H2290"\w* around \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w waist|strong="H4975"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sandals|strong="H5275"\w* \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.\f + \fr 2:5 \ft Hebrew; LXX He stained with innocent blood the belt around my waist and the sandals on my feet.\f*

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w act|strong="H6213"\w* according \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3381"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* \w gray|strong="H7872"\w* \w head|strong="H7872"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w* \f + \fr 2:7 \ft Forms of the Hebrew chesed are translated here and in most cases throughout the Scriptures as loving devotion; the range of meaning includes love, goodness, kindness, faithfulness, and mercy, as well as loyalty to a covenant.\f* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Barzillai|strong="H1271"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Gileadite|strong="H1569"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w let|strong="H3651"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* among \w those|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* eat \w at|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* stood \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* brother Absalom.

Keep \w an|strong="H7650"\w* eye \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gera|strong="H1617"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Benjamite|strong="H1145"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* Bahurim \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* called \w down|strong="H3381"\w* bitter \w curses|strong="H7043"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Mahanaim|strong="H4266"\w*, \w but|strong="H2009"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w came|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* never \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.’

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w hold|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w guiltless|strong="H5352"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H2450"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w*. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* ought \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w bring|strong="H3381"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w gray|strong="H7872"\w* \w head|strong="H7872"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.” David’s Reign and Death (1 Chronicles 29:26–30)

\w Then|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w rested|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* fathers \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H6912"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w City|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w length|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* forty \w years|strong="H8141"\w*—\w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w thirty-three|strong="H7970"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3966"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* father \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w firmly|strong="H3559"\w* \w established|strong="H3559"\w*. The Execution of Adonijah

Now Adonijah \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Haggith|strong="H2294"\w* \w went|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bathsheba|strong="H1339"\w* \w the|strong="H8010"\w* mother \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* she asked, “Do you come \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*?” “Yes, \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*,” \w he|strong="H8010"\w* replied.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w he|strong="H1696"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w something|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w*.” “\w Say|strong="H1696"\w* \w it|strong="H1696"\w*,” she \w answered|strong="H1697"\w*.

“\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* kingship \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w mine|strong="H7760"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said. “\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w expected|strong="H7760"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* kingship \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* brother, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7725"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w have|strong="H6258"\w* \w just|strong="H1696"\w* \w one|strong="H7596"\w* \w request|strong="H7596"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*; do \w not|strong="H1696"\w* \w deny|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.” “\w State|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w request|strong="H7596"\w*,” \w she|strong="H6440"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

Adonijah replied, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* speak \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w down|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* Abishag \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* wife.”

“\w Very|strong="H2896"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w*,” \w Bathsheba|strong="H1339"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*. “\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6965"\w* \w Bathsheba|strong="H1339"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* Adonijah. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w stood|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* greet \w her|strong="H5921"\w*, \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*. \w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w had|strong="H8010"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w brought|strong="H7760"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* mother, \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*.

“\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H4428"\w* just \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w small|strong="H6996"\w* \w request|strong="H7596"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*,” \w she|strong="H3588"\w* said. “Do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w deny|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.” “\w Make|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w request|strong="H7596"\w*, \w my|strong="H7725"\w* mother,” \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* replied, “\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w deny|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* Bathsheba said, “\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* Abishag \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* brother Adonijah \w as|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* wife.”

\w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w his|strong="H8010"\w* mother, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w request|strong="H7592"\w* Abishag \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Adonijah? \w Since|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w older|strong="H1419"\w* brother, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w might|strong="H1121"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* well \w request|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Abiathar \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*!”

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: “\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w punish|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w ever|strong="H2088"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* severely, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* Adonijah \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w request|strong="H1697"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* expense \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*—\w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w One|strong="H2416"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w established|strong="H3559"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H3427"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* father \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* founded \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dynasty|strong="H1004"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w*—\w surely|strong="H4191"\w* Adonijah \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*!”
